SELECT C.CODE AS RSC_CODE, C.CODE_NAME AS RSC_NAME, FN_GET_RSC_PRC(C.CODE) AS RSC_PRC, FN_GET_RSC_UNIT(C.CODE) AS RSC_UNIT, FN_GET_CODE_NAME(R.SUPLCOM_CODE) AS SUC_NAME, (sum(s.ist_cnt)-sum(s.ost_cnt)) as rsc_cnt, (select sum(pqi.podt_output * pbr.res_usage) from product_qnt_info pqi left join prdt_bom_res pbr on pqi.podt_code = pbr.podt_code where pqi.podt_etc='작년' and man_date between sysdate-380 and sysdate-350 and pbr.res_code = C.CODE) rsc_SFINVC FROM COMMON_CODE C LEFT JOIN RESOURCES R ON C.CODE = R.RSC_CODE LEFT JOIN resource_store S ON R.RSC_CODE = S.RSC_CODE WHERE CODE LIKE '%' || 'RSC' || '%' AND CODE_FLAG = 'Y' GROUP BY C.CODE,C.CODE_NAME,FN_GET_RSC_PRC(C.CODE),FN_GET_RSC_UNIT(C.CODE),FN_GET_CODE_NAME(R.SUPLCOM_CODE) ORDER BY C.CODE
